code: var ACTIONS={SET_GAIN:"Set $gain to $destination channel",SET_LOW:"Set $low to $destination channel",SET_HI:"Set $hi to $destination channel",SET_MID:"Set $mid to $destination channel",SET_FADER:"Set $Fader to mixer"};export{ACTIONS as MIXER_ACTIONS};export function setGain(destination,value){return{type:ACTIONS.SET_GAIN,destination:destination,value:value};};export function setHi(destination,value){return{type:ACTIONS.SET_HI,destination:destination,value:value};};export function setMid(destination,value){return{type:ACTIONS.SET_MID,destination:destination,value:value};};export function setLow(destination,value){return{type:ACTIONS.SET_LOW,destination:destination,value:value};};export function setFader(value){return{type:ACTIONS.SET_FADER,value:value};};
